name: feitian-sk-manager
description: Feitian Security Key Manager - Web-based management tool

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=web && cd native && cargo build --release
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=web && cd native && cargo test
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=web && cd native && cargo clippy
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=web && cd native && cargo fmt

author: Rain Zhang
